title: Email sender icons
content:
eMClient generates nice, colorful, easily identified icons in the email list. For example, an email from Redfin is a bright, big, red R. From Bark, a blue dog. From Zillow, the Zillow symbol.

This is a great feature when visually searching the Inbox.

Is there a means to have Thunderbird do this?
creator: ThurstonOR

title: I see my exact problem in a supposedly fixed bug report, but it has not been fixed for me
content:
Whenever I reopen Thunderbird 140esr (it has this behavior on 140.0, 140.1.0 and now 140.2.0), there is a second lower case "thunderbird" process that causes 50-150% CPU usage in the two processes. Also if I quit with both processes active I get an error message that "thunderbird" has unexpectedly quit. If I quit the "thunderbird" process with Activity Monitor the CPU issues go away for as long as the Thunderbird app is open.

I found this exact issue as a reported bug: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1977514&_gl=1*1coyjyr*_ga*ODYxNzE0NjQyLjE2OTY0NDU3MDg.*_ga_2VC139B3XV*czE3NTY2OTAwOTckbzMkZzEkdDE3NTY2OTAyMzYkajI0JGwwJGgw It says that it was fixed, though, and it has not been for me. Does that mean it's only been fixed in versions not yet released, or is it already (incorrectly) believed to be fixed for everyone? Thank you.
creator: jenniferehle1

title: Email problem. When I ry to open an email Thunderbird thinks I want to reply to email. Any ideas what setting is wrong? Thanks for your help.
content: When I ry to open an email Thunderbird thinks I want to reply to email. Any ideas what setting is wrong? When I click on it to read it it opens a reply or forward to email but not the email I am trying to read. Thanks for your help.

title: Calendar autocomplete not work
content:
Hello! I have a calendar connected via DAVMail (Exchange Server 2019), everything works. But when I create an event in the calendar and start adding participants, autocomplete does not work (there is no list to choose from the address book).

I have an LDAP address book configured for Global Address List (GAL) exchange.

I also imported the address book to Cardbook via .vcf.

How do I set up autocomplete in the calendar? (When writing an email, autocomplete works)
creator: pinkisanta

title: Selecing Get Messages hangs on Checking mail server capabilites
content:
My Thunderbird program stopped receiving email messages 8/21/2025 and when selecting Get Messages, it hangs up on Checking Mail Server Capabilities and that's as far as it goes and no new messages are received.

My ISP's website IS receiving my email messages and I can read them there but I prefer reading and replying on Thunderbird instead of their website.

One solution on the forum suggested disabling STARTTLS. When I put that in the search bar in Settings it says it's sorry but it didn't find anything like that.
creator: ja8483722
